description:
It is relatively easy to find people who speak Spanish nowadays. It is another story to find professionals who can write the language correctly.

Accents are an integral part of writing Spanish correctly. Learning how to do it is a lot easier than you think. I have been teaching Spanish at the college level for the past 25 years and I have refined a highly successful technique for teaching students how to master accenting Spanish words.

This is a course deigned to teach you EXACTLY how to write accents in Spanish words in a fun and playful manner. If you have always been frustrated because you did not know how to write accents in Spanish, this is your chance to learn once and for all!

This course is designed for students who are not native speakers of Spanish AND for native speakers alike.

Throughout the course you will find a series of exercises that will test whether you understood each of the lectures.

This is an engaging and fun course. Thank you for allowing me guide you!
title: Accents in Spanish words
